thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen refond optoelectronics co ltd

text:
Jan 10(Reuters) - Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics Co Ltd
* Says its wholly owned unit was recognized as high-tech enterprise, and to enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent for three years from 2017 to 2019
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/T7TtJg
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
